Veshort URL Shortener Extension makes it simple to create short branded links with just one click. You can easily generate and update links, and share them effectively.

Why choose Veshort?

Our extension allows you to create custom branded links with your domain, boosting your presence on social media. With robust out tracking you can monitor clicks, analyze traffic, and evaluate the effectiveness of your links, offering valuable insights into your marketing campaigns. You can also use our retargeting feature to re-engage users who have interacted with your links, optimizing your conversion strategies and maximizing your marketing ROI and much more

Take Control of your links with Veshort.

Features:
- Customize the link alias
- Choose redirection type
- Custom domains
- Channels
- Set password protection
- View link history
- Generate QR codes
